attributes.action: All new builds, should have photo voltaic installs by default.
attributes.additional_details: To help with the UK promise to reduce its CO2 emissions by not having to build dedicated alternatives for electricity power generating systems.
attributes.background: Pass a law that requires construction companies to install photo voltaic systems when building new properties commercial or domestic. And in such a way as to allow new owners to easily integrate battery storage into the installation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584316
